trans-unit.source: List VM Images
trans-unit.target: List VM Images

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>List VM Images</languageKeyword> operation retrieves a list of the VM Images from the image repository that is associated with the specified subscription.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>List VM Images</languageKeyword> operation retrieves a list of the VM Images from the image repository that is associated with the specified subscription.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>List VM Images</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>List VM Images</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: GET
trans-unit.target: GET

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the parameters that can be added to the URI.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the parameters that can be added to the URI.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameter
trans-unit.target: URI Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Returns VM Images from the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Returns VM Images from the specified location.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>location</parameterReference> parameter is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>location</parameterReference> parameter is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Returns VM Images that were published by the specified publisher.
trans-unit.target: Returns VM Images that were published by the specified publisher.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>publisher</parameterReference> parameter is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>publisher</parameterReference> parameter is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Returns VM Images that were assigned to the specified category.
trans-unit.target: Returns VM Images that were assigned to the specified category.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>category</parameterReference> parameter is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>category</parameterReference> parameter is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <userInput>2014-02-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <userInput>2014-02-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response Header
trans-unit.target: Response Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: The format of the response body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the response body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the response body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the response body.

trans-unit.source: Element Name
trans-unit.target: Element Name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the image.

trans-unit.source: Label
trans-unit.target: Label

trans-unit.source: Specifies an identifier for the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies an identifier for the image.

trans-unit.source: Category
trans-unit.target: Category

trans-unit.source: Specifies the repository classification of the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the repository classification of the image.

trans-unit.source: All user images have the category <languageKeyword>User</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: All user images have the category <languageKeyword>User</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Specifies the description of the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the description of the image.

trans-unit.source: Specifies configuration information for the operating system disk that is associated with the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies configuration information for the operating system disk that is associated with the image.

trans-unit.source: Specifies configuration information for the data disks that are associated with the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies configuration information for the data disks that are associated with the image.

trans-unit.source: A VM Image might not have data disks associated with it.
trans-unit.target: A VM Image might not have data disks associated with it.

trans-unit.source: ServiceName
trans-unit.target: ServiceName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the cloud service that contained the Virtual Machine from which the image was created.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the cloud service that contained the Virtual Machine from which the image was created.

trans-unit.source: DeploymentName
trans-unit.target: DeploymentName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the deployment that contained the Virtual Machine from which the image was created.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the deployment that contained the Virtual Machine from which the image was created.

trans-unit.source: RoleName
trans-unit.target: RoleName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the Virtual Machine from which the image was created.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the Virtual Machine from which the image was created.

trans-unit.source: Location
trans-unit.target: Location

trans-unit.source: Specifies the geo-location in which the media is located.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the geo-location in which the media is located.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Location</languageKeyword> value is derived from the storage account that contains the blob in which the media is located.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Location</languageKeyword> value is derived from the storage account that contains the blob in which the media is located.

trans-unit.source: If the storage account belongs to an affinity group the value is <languageKeyword>NULL</languageKeyword> and the element is not displayed in the response.
trans-unit.target: If the storage account belongs to an affinity group the value is <languageKeyword>NULL</languageKeyword> and the element is not displayed in the response.

trans-unit.source: AffinityGroup
trans-unit.target: AffinityGroup

trans-unit.source: Specifies the affinity group in which the media is located.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the affinity group in which the media is located.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>AffinityGroup</languageKeyword> value is derived from the storage account that contains the blob in which the media is located.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>AffinityGroup</languageKeyword> value is derived from the storage account that contains the blob in which the media is located.

trans-unit.source: If the storage account does not belong to an affinity group the value is <languageKeyword>NULL</languageKeyword> and the element is not displayed in the response.
trans-unit.target: If the storage account does not belong to an affinity group the value is <languageKeyword>NULL</languageKeyword> and the element is not displayed in the response.

trans-unit.source: CreatedTime
trans-unit.target: CreatedTime

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time that the image was created.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the time that the image was created.

trans-unit.source: ModifiedTime
trans-unit.target: ModifiedTime

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time that the image was last updated.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the time that the image was last updated.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>ModifiedTime</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>ModifiedTime</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Language
trans-unit.target: Language

trans-unit.source: Specifies the language of the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the language of the image.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Language</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Language</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: ImageFamily
trans-unit.target: ImageFamily

trans-unit.source: Specifies a value that can be used to group VM Images.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a value that can be used to group VM Images.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>ImageFamily</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>ImageFamily</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: RecommendedVMSize
trans-unit.target: RecommendedVMSize

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size to use for the Virtual Machine that is created from the VM Image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the size to use for the Virtual Machine that is created from the VM Image.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>RecommendedVMSize</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>RecommendedVMSize</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: IsPremium
trans-unit.target: IsPremium

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the image contains software or associated services that will incur charges above the core price for the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the image contains software or associated services that will incur charges above the core price for the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see the <languageKeyword>PricingDetailLink</languageKeyword> element.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see the <languageKeyword>PricingDetailLink</languageKeyword> element.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>IsPremium</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>IsPremium</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Eula
trans-unit.target: Eula

trans-unit.source: Specifies the End User License Agreement that is associated with the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the End User License Agreement that is associated with the image.

trans-unit.source: The value for this element is a string, but it is recommended that the value be a URL that points to a EULA.
trans-unit.target: The value for this element is a string, but it is recommended that the value be a URL that points to a EULA.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Eula</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Eula</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: IconUri
trans-unit.target: IconUri

trans-unit.source: Specifies the URI to the icon that is displayed for the image in the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the URI to the icon that is displayed for the image in the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>IconUri</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>IconUri</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: SmallIconUri
trans-unit.target: SmallIconUri

trans-unit.source: Specifies the URI to the small icon that is displayed for the image in the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the URI to the small icon that is displayed for the image in the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>SmallIconUri</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>SmallIconUri</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: PrivacyUri
trans-unit.target: PrivacyUri

trans-unit.source: Specifies the URI that points to a document that contains the privacy policy related to the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the URI that points to a document that contains the privacy policy related to the image.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>PrivacyUri</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>PrivacyUri</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: PublishedDate
trans-unit.target: PublishedDate

trans-unit.source: Specifies the date when the image was added to the image repository.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the date when the image was added to the image repository.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>PublishedDate</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>PublishedDate</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-05-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: OSDiskConfiguration
trans-unit.target: OSDiskConfiguration

trans-unit.source: Specifies configuration information for the operating system disk that is associated with the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies configuration information for the operating system disk that is associated with the image.

trans-unit.source: Element Name
trans-unit.target: Element Name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the operating system disk.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the operating system disk.

trans-unit.source: HostCaching
trans-unit.target: HostCaching

trans-unit.source: Specifies the caching behavior of the operating system disk.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the caching behavior of the operating system disk.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: OSState
trans-unit.target: OSState

trans-unit.source: Specifies the state of the operating system in the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the state of the operating system in the image.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: A Virtual Machine that is fully configured and running contains a <languageKeyword>Specialized</languageKeyword> operating system.
trans-unit.target: A Virtual Machine that is fully configured and running contains a <languageKeyword>Specialized</languageKeyword> operating system.

trans-unit.source: A Virtual Machine on which the Sysprep command has been run with the generalize option contains a <languageKeyword>Generalized</languageKeyword> operating system.
trans-unit.target: A Virtual Machine on which the Sysprep command has been run with the generalize option contains a <languageKeyword>Generalized</languageKeyword> operating system.

trans-unit.source: OS
trans-unit.target: OS

trans-unit.source: Specifies the operating system type of the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the operating system type of the image.

trans-unit.source: MediaLink
trans-unit.target: MediaLink

trans-unit.source: Specifies the location of the blob in Azure storage.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the location of the blob in Azure storage.

trans-unit.source: The blob location belongs to a storage account in the subscription specified by the <languageKeyword>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</languageKeyword> value in the operation call.
trans-unit.target: The blob location belongs to a storage account in the subscription specified by the <languageKeyword>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</languageKeyword> value in the operation call.

trans-unit.source: LogicalSizeInGB
trans-unit.target: LogicalSizeInGB

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size, in GB, of the operating system disk.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the size, in GB, of the operating system disk.

trans-unit.source: IOType
trans-unit.target: IOType

trans-unit.source: Identifies the type of the storage account for the backing VHD.
trans-unit.target: Identifies the type of the storage account for the backing VHD.

trans-unit.source: If the backing VHD is in an Provisioned Storage account, “Provisioned” is returned otherwise “Standard” is returned.
trans-unit.target: If the backing VHD is in an Provisioned Storage account, “Provisioned” is returned otherwise “Standard” is returned.

trans-unit.source: Note: This value is populated by Azure platform when the disk is created, not by the user.
trans-unit.target: Note: This value is populated by Azure platform when the disk is created, not by the user.

trans-unit.source: This property is only returned with a version header of 2014-10-01 or newer.
trans-unit.target: This property is only returned with a version header of 2014-10-01 or newer.

trans-unit.source: DataDiskConfigurations
trans-unit.target: DataDiskConfigurations

trans-unit.source: Specifies configuration information for the data disks that are associated with the image.
trans-unit.target: Specifies configuration information for the data disks that are associated with the image.

trans-unit.source: Element Name
trans-unit.target: Element Name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the data disk.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the data disk.

trans-unit.source: HostCaching
trans-unit.target: HostCaching

trans-unit.source: Specifies the caching behavior of the data disk.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the caching behavior of the data disk.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: Lun
trans-unit.target: Lun

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Logical Unit Number (LUN) for the data disk.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Logical Unit Number (LUN) for the data disk.

trans-unit.source: MediaLink
trans-unit.target: MediaLink

trans-unit.source: Specifies the location of the blob in Azure storage.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the location of the blob in Azure storage.

trans-unit.source: The blob location belongs to a storage account in the subscription specified by the <languageKeyword>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</languageKeyword> value in the operation call.
trans-unit.target: The blob location belongs to a storage account in the subscription specified by the <languageKeyword>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</languageKeyword> value in the operation call.

trans-unit.source: LogicalSizeInGB
trans-unit.target: LogicalSizeInGB

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size, in GB, of the data disk.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the size, in GB, of the data disk.

trans-unit.source: IOType
trans-unit.target: IOType

trans-unit.source: Identifies the type of the storage account for the backing VHD.
trans-unit.target: Identifies the type of the storage account for the backing VHD.

trans-unit.source: If the backing VHD is in an Provisioned Storage account, “Provisioned” is returned otherwise “Standard” is returned.
trans-unit.target: If the backing VHD is in an Provisioned Storage account, “Provisioned” is returned otherwise “Standard” is returned.

trans-unit.source: Note: This value is populated by Azure platform when the disk is created, not by the user.
trans-unit.target: Note: This value is populated by Azure platform when the disk is created, not by the user.

trans-unit.source: This property is only returned with a version header of 2014-10-01 or newer.
trans-unit.target: This property is only returned with a version header of 2014-10-01 or newer.
